DOC.brief_title: Enhancing Knowledge Translation Nutrition Through Healthy Eating Blog
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomise experimental group expose one blog post week period 6 month . Blog post focus improvement fruit vegetable consumption target four main determinant behavior : ( 1 ) knowledge ; ( 2 ) attitude ; ( 3 ) self-efficacy ; ( 4 ) motivation/goals . Each post include step-by-step recipe develop research team feature fruit vegetable . Recipes describe textually also use picture and/or video . Twenty-six post create six-month intervention . Participants randomise control group expose healthy eating blog . Feasibility ( compliance , dropout participation rate ) acceptability ( satisfaction ) study assess .
DOC.criteria: woman age 18 old ; Internet access well active email address ; consume five less serving F & V per day ; live Quebec City metropolitan . woman diet , currently pregnant lactating .
